Title: Amends the New York city public works investment act to include and permit progressive design-build contracts for certain public works projects
Summary: Amends the New York city public works investment act to include and permit progressive design-build contracts for certain public works projects which involves procurement selection through a qualifications-based process.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 749 of the laws of 2019 constituting the New York city public works investment act, in relation to permitting progressive design build contracts for certain public works projects
